original_text: And Stephen, full of grace and power, was doing great wonders and signs among the people.
korean_text: 스데반이 은혜와 권능이 충만하여 큰 기사와 표적을 민간에 행하니

sentences.original_text: And Stephen, full of grace and power,
was doing great wonders and signs among the people.
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들 가운데서 큰 기적과 표적을 행하고 있었습니다.
